body.name: SpeedTalk Mobile GPS Tracker SIM Card Starter Kit | 3 in 1 Universal Simcard: Standard, Micro, Nano for Kids Senior Pet Car Fitness Activity 5G 4G LTE Tracking Devices | No Contract
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Tuesday, February 20 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Thursday, February 15. Order within 7 hrs 47 mins
features: Activate with any of SpeedTalk Mobile’s affordable nationwide wireless service plans available for purchase upon service activation.
Our service will connect you to our SpeedTalk Network and will work within the United States Canada & Mexico.

EASY ACTIVATION: Valid credit card is needed at activation, No contracts, Cancel anytime. Speedtalk Mobile offers its services through subscription plans. You can also call us for assistance 7 days a week LIVE CUSTOMER SUPPORT when you call our toll-free number.

Our SIM cards are designed for use in All Trackers, IoT devices, tablets, PCs, watches, pet trackers, security cameras, trail and game cameras for hunting, 4G routers, GPS devices, car locators, M2M Devices and more. This SIM kit is pre-cut in 3 sizes to fit any device: Standard, Micro and Nano sizes.
You have the option to port-in (keep) your existing phone number or get a new number upon activation. Activate and manage your account with our Mobile App, available for iOS, Android and Desktop.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Our prepaid SIM card can be used with any unlocked 5G 4G LTE GSM device such as but not limited to: GPS TrackersGSM compatible GPS GPRS TrackersCar, Motorcycle and Bike TrackersSeniors, Kids, Adults and Personal GPS TrackersSpecial Needs GPS TrackersPet, Dog and Cat TrackersFleet TrackersMagnetic GPS Tracker for Vehicles and TrailersAsset TrackersSmall Portable GPS Tracking DeviceLone Worker TrackersAny Unlocked Cellular enabled GPS Trackers

Majority of GSM GPS trackers today uses cellular technology to remotely communicate with these devices. You will need a SIM card to enable tracking services to work and communicate with the tracker remotely via the phone number associated with the SIM card. Some use text messaging to locate the tracker, other devices use data connection. Either way, our service offer voice call, text and nationwide 5G/4G LTE Data. Our service will only work within the United States. * International Roaming is available with purchase of international Add-on. Check Coverage at STKMap To activate please visit us at ActivateSpeedTalk. NOTE: After SIM activation, it may take up to 24-hrs for the GPRS and data settings to sync and update with your device. Make sure you turned on the power of your device in an area with good signal reception. Enterprise, Corporate and Affiliate Accounts are available - online account management portal and API’s to manage multiple SIM cards within single account and one main airtime balance. SpeedTalk offers its services through subscription plans which auto-renew every 30 days. Service begins as soon as you activate your service. You'll be charged the rate stated at the time of purchase, every month, until you cancel. There is No Contract, Cancellations can be made any time by contacting customer support. A valid credit card is required to cover overages in case you exceed the applicable Voice, SMS and Data limits. To avoid overage charges, you should purchase the appropriate plan for your anticipated needs.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 16, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A great budget option
reviews.reviewText: We have been using SpeedTalk for years to manage our tracking devices. With 3G going away I had to replace my tracker and purchased this sim card to use in the new device. But, truth be told, I never put it into service. My old sim card from a couple years ago still works perfectly and was a straight transfer from one device to another and we are still operating as we always have.These guys are easy to work with and are quite helpful when you need them. The price options are many with the lowest being $5 a month, plus they have had some offers that gave me free time. They may still have them and will step right up and advise you that you have time coming. (Not sure if they still have this but it has been my experience over the years.) I set mine up with an automatic pay using a gift card to limit my exposier. Then after seeing that they were very honest and did not make billing errors I placed them on my regular card and forget the bill. It is charged to my card every month and I do not have to be concerned. (Just my trust in them. You may differ.)Bottom line is the sim card works, the service works and they have multiple options and will help advise you as to what will work best for your needs. I was surprised, back then, when they told me that my best option was their least expensive. Expected to be over sold but was not. We love these guys service. Which, by the way, has never had a single glitch.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 9, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I bought this for a gps tracker but IT DID NOT WORK!!! It says it’s $5 bucks but you are obligated to buy 3 months worth not month to month. Then you are charged again after 3 months. The instructions were never clear and I NEVER WAS NOT ABLE TO USE IT!!!! NEEDLESS TO SAY I AM PAYING FOR SOMETHING I AM NOT USING!!!!!!!THERE IS NO SMALL PRINT REGARDING THE ABOVE. DO NOT BUY!!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 13, 2018
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Prepaid sim card but it is not. You pay double when activating it
reviews.reviewText: I gave 3 stars because it works. But they basically mislead us saying the sim card was ready to use just activate. When we activated it, it prompted to make another paymet of same amount as we had paid on Amazon. it said it was prepaid but it was not true, since we had to pay again to be able to use it while they advertised it was prepaid ready to use. it doesnt have a monthly contract but it does, or it will get cancelled. I called to refill it and customer service said it was cancelled. That i had to buy again and activate again. So it is a scam.... the good thing it is that makes the kids watch work amazingly. Very disapointed that they were jot able to activate the sim card even when ready to pay w cc. They were cold and didnt care if i needed it or not. Tried to send me to.walgreens or walmart to see if they carried it there which they didnt. Disapointed formthe service.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Came quick and was package good I’ll give it a 4 star because I just start using it but great so far

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great price for when you need a simm
reviews.reviewText: I decided to get a tracker for my car after it was broken into. The tracker needed a simm to allow tracking by phone. This simm costs me $3 per month and allows me to track my car should someone take it. It also is motion activated, so should someone walk into your car, it sends you a message.

reviews.reviewTitle: No mention that this sim card works only for US phones
reviews.reviewText: I purchased several of these cards for my grandkids after I got them a kids smartwatch, only to learn that the sim cards work only in the US. No mention of this in the product description. Another reason why I need to stop shopping at Amazon ...
Nunca funcionó pero sigo recibiendo el cargo mensual a mi tarjeta de Credito… siento como si estuviera manteniendo al hijo del vecino lol
